about_the_game:
Death Blonde is a team-based online car arena shooter where style meets destruction. Customise your ride, join online battles, and leave your enemies in the dust. Drive fast, shoot hard, and wear fashion - because even death deserves style.

The "Death Blonde" is the legendary car driven by the infamous skeleton racer Ken K. King, better known as "Triple K." For over 20 years, Triple K and his iconic car have ruled the deadly racing scene, becoming symbols of unmatched skill, speed, and style. Now, every driver dreams of surpassing the legend in J-City, the hub of high-stakes racing.

This universe revolves entirely around the races and vehicle production. Metroil handles mechanical assembly, while Perfectia drives technological innovation, making speed and progress the pillars of its society.

In Death Blonde, players can customize every aspect of their vehicle and avatar. Choose from a wide range of cars, wheels, smoke effects, and unique accessories to create your distinct look. Add exclusive emotes to express your personality on the track, taking your style to the next level with numerous options. Many items are unlockable, and there's always something new to discover, keeping the excitement fresh. Every detail matters in this world of speed and chaos.

Join a bone-rattling gameplay experience in Death Blonde, where players team up for intense battles in deadly arenas. Strategy and teamwork are key as you race through thrilling shooter combat, with quick and exciting matches that keep you on the edge of your seat. Fire, smash, flip, and unleash powerful ultimate abilities that can turn the tide of the battle.

Features:

 •  Symbiotic driving and shooting gameplay.

 •  Matchmaking based multiplayer online.

 •  20+ game modes packed into 3 playlists: free-for-all, team battle, team objective.

 •  Team-based gameplay with match-turning abilities.

 •  Daily unlockable items, including vehicles, avatars, and emotes.

 •  Cyber psychedelic cel shaded graphics.

 •  Cross-play and cross-progression.

name: Death Blonde

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5 (4th gen)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Core i5 (6th gen) or higher
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad Preferred. Full Controller Support.
